data.title: Markdown Tutorial
data.intro: Introduction tutorial to the Markdown language
data.content:
Markdown is a simple but widely used language, especially for documentation.

Every section has the syntax first and the rendered example right after.

Let's see how we can write with it!

Text

**bold text**
*italicized text*
~~strikethrough text~~

bold text, italicized text and strikethrough text

Heading

# H1
## H2

H1

H2

Blockquote

> blockquote

blockquote

Ordered list

1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item
  1. First item
  2. Second item
  3. Third item

Unordered list

- First item
- Second item
- Third item
  • First item
  • Second item
  • Third item

Code

`code`

code

Horizontal rule

---

Link

[title](https://remybeumier.be)

title

Image

![alt text](/images/rb.png)

Task list

- [x] Completed
- [ ] Uncompleted
  • Completed
  • Uncompleted

Table

| First col title | Second col title |
| ----------- | ----------- |
| row1 col1 | row1 col2 |
| row2 col1 | row2 col2 |
First col title Second col title
row1 col1 row1 col2
row2 col1 row2 col2

Enjoy writing with Markdown!

pageProps.description: Introduction tutorial to the Markdown language
